summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Arts Commission; authorizing agreements for the design and execution of certain wall murals for public display and authorizing agreements with the Seattle Steam Corporation and with the Arcade Building and Realty Company for the Lease of wall space therefor on buildings located at 1319 Western Avenue and 1312 2nd Avenue, respectively, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
